intro.title: Personal Introduction
intro.paragraph1: I am a passionate full-stack engineer with five years of software development experience. I specialize in building high-performance, scalable web applications using modern technology stacks. I excel in both frontend and backend development, with complete project development experience, capable of handling the entire process from requirements analysis to deployment.
intro.paragraph2: Beyond technology, I am passionate about learning new technologies, participating in open-source projects, and sharing my development experiences and thoughts through this blog. I believe that continuous learning and knowledge sharing are essential qualities for becoming an excellent engineer.

frontend.description: Responsible for enterprise-level web application development, building user interfaces with React and TypeScript
